links.title: Early sales of iPhone XS and XS Max below Apple's peak levels, expected to slow down
links.description: With the iPhone 6 (and especially the iPhone 6 Plus) Apple made the move to larger screens, a move that proved wildly successful. The XS generation also bumped the screen size, but the chatter from the supply chain indicates that Apple will not be able to recreate the success.

links.title: Rumor: Buyback 'blackouts' mean weak stocks. Fact: Not really
links.description: Scott Eells | Bloomberg | Getty Images Earnings season is upon us, and once again there are dire warnings that stocks will be weak because companies are entering a "blackout period" where they will not be able to buy back their stock.

messages.body: $AAPL Trader Todd Gordon believes Apple could soon reach all time highs. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-technical-analyst-sees-more-new-highs-ahead/

links.title: Apple, Inc. (AAPL) Technical Analyst Sees More New Highs Ahead for Apple Shares
links.description: Apple's (NASDAQ:AAPL) rally is going to increase according to TradingAnalysis.com founder Todd Gordon. Apple's market cap passed $1 trillion for the first time in August, and Gordon believes the company's earnings report in late October will boost it even further. After reaching the market cap milestone the firm's shares have gone up more than 10 percent.

links.title: Apple, Inc. (AAPL) Apple Watch Has New Safety Feature Users Should Turn On
links.description: Apple, Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) new Apple Watches contain security features such as detecting if someone slips and falls. The Apple Watch has a feature that can be turned on from the iPhone to help users get help if they fall with inbuilt sensors.
